name: Land of Lanterns
description:
Diseased by darkness, our traveler must light the way forward in order to ward off the beasts of night. Venture through various biomes bringing flame to the several lanterns that form a path of safety for many to follow. Explore the world and witness the effects of these beasts firsthand. In this game you are a Light Bearer, so with that said, bring light to this world.

Any criticism and critique is much appreciated! This is my first published work and first "finished" game and I am eager to see how it fares. I definitely have much to learn but I hope this serves as a good beginning.
